original_title: There's a Nightmare in My Closet
overview: Based on the book by Mercer Mayer, this story will appeal to anyone whose imagination ever turned their bedroom into a scary place once the lights went out. Five-year-old Christopher firmly believes that there's a Nightmare hiding in his closet, but no one takes him seriously. Taking matters into his own hands, Christopher confronts his Nightmare and calms his fears.
title: There's a Nightmare in My Closet
